00059     typedef DrawableObject Base;

00062         /* The types of events that the player supports, note:
00063             * this list is still very much draft. */
00064         typedef enum {
00065             SvgFocusInEvent = 1,
00066             SvgFocusOutEvent,
00067             SvgUiActivateEvent,

00069             SvgClickEvent,
00070             SvgSelectPreviousHyperlinkEvent,

00079             NoError = 0,
00080             OutOfMemoryError,
00081             InitializationError,

00085             IllegalZoomLevel,
00086             AlreadySet,

00088             DecodingInterruptedError,

00090         } SvgErrorType;
